title: Shadows in the High Ward
description: Councilor Vane's aide has gone missing after claiming to hold evidence of corruption in the city's food supply. You must investigate the Azure Balconies before the evidence disappears.

turns.narrative: You arrive at the Azure Balconies, a wealth-drenched terrace overlooking the Lower Ward. Elara's apartment door is slightly ajar. A faint smell of burnt ozone lingers in the air.
turns.choice_a: Kick the door in and prepare for an ambush (Combat Advantage)
turns.consequence_a: You catch a Silken Assailant rifling through her desk. You get the drop on them.
turns.choice_b: Sneak through the adjacent balcony (Stealth check)
turns.consequence_b: You slip in unnoticed, observing the Assailant pocketing a wax-sealed letter before engaging.

turns.narrative: The Assailant is dead, but Elara is nowhere to be found. Her apartment has been swept clean, except for a hidden compartment under a floorboard that the assassin missed.
turns.consequence_a: The lock breaks, but a small poison needle pricks your finger. You take minor damage but recover the ledger.
turns.consequence_b: You bypass the needle trap gracefully, securing a ledger titled 'The Silken Hand - Requisitions'.

turns.narrative: The ledger contains coded entries for massive food purchases shipped to an unknown 'Archive'. As you read, the City Watch arrives, tipped off by a neighbor.
turns.choice_a: Show them the ledger and report the assassination attempt
turns.consequence_a: The Guard Captain suspiciously confiscates the ledger 'for official review'. You lose the primary evidence but avoid arrest.
turns.choice_b: Flee via the rooftops with the ledger
turns.consequence_b: You evade the Watch, keeping the ledger, but causing your reputation in the High Ward to dip slightly.

surrendered_ledger.description: You gave the ledger to the Watch. Councilor Vane is disappointed but intrigued.

kept_ledger.description: You kept the ledger. Vane is impressed and pays handsomely for the intelligence.

conclusion: You gave the ledger to the Watch. Councilor Vane is disappointed but intrigued.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
